sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; const Home = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); return ( <> {/* Hero Section */}

Your Health Is Our Priority

Providing exceptional healthcare services with compassion and cutting-edge technology for over 25 years.

{!user ? ( <> Book an Appointment ) : ( Go to Dashboard )}
{/* Services Section */}

Our Services

Comprehensive healthcare services for all your needs

Cardiology

Advanced cardiac care with state-of-the-art diagnostic equipment.

Orthopedics

Specialized care for bones, joints, and musculoskeletal system.

Neurology

Comprehensive neurological care for brain disorders.

View All Services
{/* Quick Links */}

Quick Access

Book Appointment

Find a Doctor

Patient Portal

{!user && Login Required}
{/* Footer */}

MediCare Hospital

45 Healthway Boulevard
Central Medical District, Mumbai, MH 400001

Accredited by: National Accreditation Board for Hospitals (NABH)
License No: MH/2025/HOSP/0123

Quick Links

  • Home
  • Services
  • Find a Doctor
  • Book Appointment

Contact & Hours

Emergency (24/7): +91 22 4000 9111
Appointments: +91 22 4000 9222
Email: appointments@medicarehospital.in

Visiting Hours: Mon–Sun, 8:00 AM – 8:00 PM
Outpatient Clinics: Mon–Sat, 9:00 AM – 5:00 PM

Newsletter

Get health tips, event updates and latest research delivered to your inbox.

e.preventDefault()} style={{ display: 'flex', gap: 8, marginTop: 8 }}>
Connect with us

© {new Date().getFullYear()} MediCare Hospital — All Rights Reserved.

Privacy Policy • Terms & Conditions • Patient Rights
); }; export default Home;
